attributes.action: Allow Scots to pay for their own prescriptions & education like England does.
attributes.background: Scotland is currently denied being able to pay for their own prescriptions & education like the rest of the country does. Help them to feel unity with Britain by allowing them the same privileges as English people.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
